[\[282a.5\]]yongs su bskor nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i yid kyi gnas pas gnas te/_snga na ma mthong ba 'di rnams ci yin lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang sngar nam yang de ltar nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa/_shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i go 'phang lha rnams kyis nyams 
[\[282a.6\]]su myong ba yin no zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i shin tu mi rigs pa rnams de skad du rjod par yang byed do/_/de ltar de dag rnams sems par byed pa nyid dang phan tshun du gleng bar yang byed pa dang mchog tu skyo ba'i yid du yang 'gyur ro/_/'dab ma gzhan 
[\[282a.7\]]nyid kyang rab tu lhung bar gyur pas lha mo rnams thams cad kyang shin tu nyams smas par gyur nas phan tshun du rnam par khro bar byed pa dang /_hA yongs su skyobs dang zhes bya ba de ltar phan tshun du rjod par yang byed do/_/ji ltar gang dag bag med par gyur pas bag med par rgyu 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bar byed pa de dag rnams kyi ni gnas skabs 'di yin la/_rnam par lhung ba'i rnam pa rnams kyang 'di 'dra ba yin no/_/de ltar phan tshun rnam par khro ba rnams las rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams kyi yid las su rung bar byas te/_bag med pa nyams dma' bar gyur pa rnams 
[\[282b.2\]]ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams bsgrub pa la las su rung ba yin par mthong nas/_mchog tu gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mu su lun d+ha des de dag rnams la yang phan pa'i don du yang lha de dag dang bcas pa'i pad ma'i snying po de nyid mi mthong bar bsgyur ro/_/
[\[282b.3\]]de yis 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po bag med pas na bag med par rnam par spyod par byed pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi yid dge legs dang ldan par gyur to/_/de ltar legs par skyes par gyur nas dus 'di nyid du ni 'di dag rnams dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa rab tu 'dzin 
[\[282b.4\]]par 'gyur te dam pa'i chos bsgrag par bya'o/_/de nas der de ltar rig nas mtsho der 'jigs pa chen po'i rim pa du ma gzhan nyid kyang sprul par byed pa yin te/_'dab ma brgya yang 'jig pa dang sprul pa'i lha rnams kyang 'jigs pa chen po rnam pa du ma dang /_phung nyes 
[\[282b.5\]]rnams dang mtsho la yang 'bying bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rnam pa du mar kun du rjod par byed pa dang yid nyams smas pa kun du 'byung ba dang /_'chi bar 'gyur ba du ma yang sprul par gyur to/_/de dus ring du rtogs par byed de/_de dag gis kyang rang bzhin 
[\[282b.6\]]gyis lha de dag gi 'gros bcom zhing /_ji lta ba bzhin du yid nyams smad nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na yang de ltar byung ba'i 'gros bcom nas ji ltar de dag gis mthong bar 'gyur bar byed do/_/mthong ba'i rjes thogs nyid la yid shin tu nyams dmas shing skyo ba skye ba 
[\[282b.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thams cad byas nas pad ma'i nang gi snying po la rjes su zhugs te/_bag med pa'i lha de dag rnams nyid dang lhan cig tu lta bar byed pa dang lhan cig tu spyod par yang gyur pa na yang /_shar bar gyur pa legs par mngon par mthong ba dang gzhan 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]la phan pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang /_mchog tu snying rje che ba dang gzhan rnams la phan pa dang rab tu ldan pas legs par zhugs pas kyang lha de dag rnams kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pas pad ma'i snying po de kun du btang bar gyur to/_/
[\[283a.2\]]sprul pa de dag rnams kyang mi snang bar byas nas dbugs 'byin par byed do/_/ji ltar shin tu bar yang 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su lha dag 'gro bar byed pa/_shin tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i gnas rnams su rab tu 'gro ba na bag med pas 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su 
[\[283a.3\]]'gro bar ma byed cig_/bag med pas rnam par rgyu ba rnams kyi gnas skabs ni 'di dag yin no/_/bag med pas rgyu bar byed pa rnams ni bag med pa'i rtsa ba las shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba yin te/_bag med pa la sdug bsngal rnams mi 'byung ba ni 'ga' yang med do/_/
[\[283a.4\]]de nas dus de dag tu mu su lun d+has tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs rnams brjod pa/_ji ltar/_bag med la ni mngon dga'i byis/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal skal ldan yin/_/gang yang bag med rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu bde ba'i skal ldan de/_/sdug bsngal ljon shing 
[\[283a.5\]]thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba bag med par brjod do/_/de phyir sdug bsngal yongs spong bas/_/bag med pa ni rnam par spongs/_/de nas lha rang bzhin pa de dag gis kyang mu su lun d+ha de mngon par mthong nas/_de dag rnams yid rnal du phebs pa dang ches rab tu dga' bar gyur 
[\[283a.6\]]nas/_gang na 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag de yod pa der thams cad nyid nye bar brgyugs so/_/ji ltar lha bdag cag rnams kyi mgon po de bdag cag rnams kyi mgon po bdag cag 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag de ni pad ma'i snying po la lha'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs 
[\[283a.7\]]su bskor nas legs par gnas te/_bdag cag rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'dir byon no/_/de ltar phan tshun du rig par gyur nas gang na pad ma'i snying po yod pa der thams cad nyid nye bar 'gro bar byed/_de nas nye bar song ba dang pad ma'i snying po la rang nyid legs par 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]gnas pa gang yin pa 'di ni mu su lun d+ha kun du gnas pa yin no/_/pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la kha dog mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa rnams kyi lha gzhan gyis zhabs 'bring byas nas nye bar 'gro ba na lha de dag gis mu su lun d+ha de la 'di skad ces brjod de/_lha lags lha 'di 
[\[283b.2\]]dag rnams gang yin pa la de ltar mtho 'tsham par byed pa 'di dag ci lags/_'ching bar byed pa dang kun du skor bar byed pa dang /_chu rnams la yang kun du nub par byed par gyur pa dang rnam par khro bar yang byed pa dang rnam pa mang po'i gnas skabs rnams kyang byed du 'jug lags na/_de nas mu su lun d+ha des 
[\[283b.3\]]lha de dag rnams la 'di skad ces brjod de/_ji ltar srog chags su gyur pa rnams thams cad kyis ni ci nas kyang myong bar bya ba gang yin pa ni bag med pa'i skyon 'di dag rnams yin par khyed rnams kyis legs par ma go'o/_/de nas de'i dus na mu su lun d+has/_tshigs su bcad 
[\[283b.4\]]pa'i dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa/_ji ltar/_'byung po thams cad kyis mi mthong /_/las rnams kun gyis rgyal ba min/_/'jig rten thams cad rnam 'jig pa/_/'chi bdag ces ni mngon par brjod/_/de yis skye bo 'di dag 'joms/_/phung po skye mched 'joms byed 
[\[283b.5\]]po/_/'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos kun tu 'khrid/_/'di yis 'khrid par gyur pa na/_/de 'ga' zhig la'ang stobs mi dmigs/_/chos ma gtogs pa de yi phyir/_/chos ni skyob pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/gson pa yang ni myur bar 
[\[283b.6\]]'gro/_/myur bar lang tsho 'gro ba yin/_/'chi bdag myur bar 'ong ba yin/_/bag med pa yis dga' ma byed/_/lus can rnams kyi bder gyur pa/_/thams cad 'jig pa'i rgud pa yin/_/gson pa yang ni mthar 'joms kyi/_/bag med pa la dga' ma byed/_/
[\[283b.7\]]dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gror ni/_/las kun zad nas 'gro dgos kyi/_/shes kyis sdug bsngal mi bzad 'di/_/dga' bar ma byed bag med la/_/srid gsum ngam grog srid 'di gang /_/mi rtag pa yi thabs 'og yin/_/skye zhing 'chi ba de lta la/_/bag 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]med pa la dga' ma byed/_/'chi bdag gis ni lus 'joms la/_/rgas pa yis ni gzhon pa 'joms/_/so gsod pa ni nad kyis 'joms/_/bag med pas ni dga' ma byed/_/las kyi thag pas rnam bcings nas/_/sems kyi 'phyang mo la 
[\[284a.2\]]legs rten/_/sems can srid pa gsum na 'khyam/_/dga' bar ma byed bag med la/_/skyid de ba yang sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal can yang rnal phebs gnas/_/rje dpon yang ni bran 'gyur gyi/_/bag med pa la dga' ma byed/_/ma yang chung 
[\[284a.3\]]mar 'gyur ba dang /_/chung ma yang ni dgra 'di nyid/_/'gyur ldog chen po 'di 'dra la/_/bag med pa la dga' ma byed/_/nags dang nye nags brag rnams la/_/lha yi tshogs kyis brgyan pa yi/_/'jig rten 'di ni med 'gyur gyi/_/bag med pa la 
[\[284a.4\]]dga' ma byed/_/lus can rnams kyi bde ba ni/_/g.yo zhing 'tshe dang bcas pa yin/_/yid ches med dang stong pa la/_/bag med pa la dga' ma byed/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir skye 'di yang /_/rga dang nad kyi snod yin no/_/skye ba nges par 'chi ba yang /_/
[\[284a.5\]]gang gis thams cad du nus min/_/skye ba thams cad 'chi ba'i mtha'/_/de bzhin lang tsho rgas pa'i mtha'/_/rmi lam lta bu'i 'dod pa la/_/bag med pas ni dga' mi bya/_/chu shing lo ma dang mtshungs dang /_/glog rnams dang yang rab tu 
[\[284a.6\]]mtshungs/_/slu bar byed pa thams cad la/_/bag med pas ni dga' ma byed/_/yul gyi spyod yul can dbang po/_/rgyal bar bya bar nus ma yin/_/dbang po rnams kyi rang yul las/_/gang phyir shes pas zlog par byed/_/de ltar mu su lun d+ha des lha de dag rnams 
[\[284a.7\]]kyi yid skyo bar gyur pa la gzhan la phan pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa rnams ji lta bar rjod do/_/gzhan yang 'thab bral ba'i bdag po de nyid kyis lha rnams kyi bag med pa la rnam par gshe'o/_/ji ltar bag med pa'i mun par 'og tu nub pa de dag ma mthong ba rnams ni sdug 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bsngal chen por gyur pa dang rgas pa dang 'chi ba rnams 'byung bar gyur to/_/ji ltar lha de dag ni khyed rnams nyid dang mtshungs pa yin te/_phyin ci log rnams la ji lta bar zhugs nas bag med pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams yin te/_phyin ci log nyid la zhugs pa rnams 
[\[284b.2\]]thams cad la yongs su skyob par byed pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/gang khyed rnams kyi khyad par las tshul thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pa rnams bag med pas brlag par gyur nas/_tshad dang /_mdog dang /_dbyibs dang /_nye bar longs spyod pa dang /_khang bu dang /_
[\[284b.3\]]'od zer dang /_lha mo dang /_skye bo rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa de dag rnams khyed rnams kyis mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin na/_ji ltar na yongs su spyad par 'gyur ba yin/_ji ltar ni 'khor rnams dang bcas pa yin/_phyin ci log la zhugs pa de'i tshe/_de dag ni bag 
[\[284b.4\]]med pa'i skyon gyis yin par mngon par mthong ba'i phyir na/_thams cad la dus thams cad du thabs rnams thams cad kyis bag med pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/gang cung zad cig 'tsho ba 'di 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i bag med pa'i 'tsho ba de dag rnams ni dug gis zin pa rnams 
[\[284b.5\]]las kyang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/gang 'ga' zhig me rlung dang bcas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung na bag med pa'i me kun du rtog pa'i rlung dang bcas pa ni shin tu bar yang lhag pa yin no/_/gang cung zad cig mun pa dus ring du 'thibs pa rnams las 
[\[284b.6\]]bag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mun pa ni de dag rnams las zla med par khyad par du gyur pa yin te/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas kun la ring du 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang 'ga' zhig dgra bo glags gcod par byed pa rnams kyi nang nas/_bag med pa'i dgra ni de dag rnams 
[\[284b.7\]]kyi drung na khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/_yul gyi grogs rnams kyis kun nas glags gcod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang cung zad mtshon char brjod par bya ba so rnon po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i mtshon gyi so rnams ni lhag par rno ba yin te ngan song du log par ltung 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ba'i rtse mo rnon po rnams yod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang 'ga' zhig sbrul dug can du gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung nas bag med pa'i sbrul gyi dug gis sems can thams cad kyi srog nges par 'phrog par byed pa'i dug chen po de ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin te byis pa'i 
[\[285a.2\]]skye bo rnams thams cad kyi sems stobs nges par 'joms pa'i phyir ro/_/gang cung zad grogs po'i gzugs can grogs po ma yin pa rnams las bag med pa ni de dag rnams kyi nang na bla lhag pa yin te dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang kun du 'dres pa'i phyir ro/_/gang cung zad 
[\[285a.3\]]'ching bar gyur pa lcags sgrog gam shing gdos sam/_thag pa las byas pa de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa ni bla lhag pa yin te zhe sdang 'thug po dang kun du 'dres pa'i phyir ro/_/gang 'ga' zhig pas bla lhag par gyur pa ni dgon par rnam par 'khyams par gyur pa rnams la chu 
[\[285a.4\]]dag dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_'bras bu dang /_grib ma dang bzhon pa yang med pas sems can rnams thams cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i dgon pa ni shin tu bla lhag pa yin te/_bde ba'i chu dag dang /_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi 
[\[285a.5\]]ljon shing gi grib ma rnams las tha mar sems can rnams thams cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang 'ga' zhig rnam par slu bar byed pa po'i ngo bo don med par gyur pa mthong ba rnams las/_'di dag gi ji lta ba'i don ni 'di lta ste/_zo chun 'khor mo dang /_dri za'i grong 
[\[285a.6\]]khyer dang /_smig rgyu rnams so/_/de dag rnams kyi drung na yang bag med pa ni shin tu lhag pa yin te/_yul gyi nye bar longs spyod pa rnams ni g.yo bar gyur pa ji lta ba'i don dang bral bas na zo chun 'khor mo dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_smig rgyu rnams las kyang bla lhag par 
[\[285a.7\]]stong pa yin no/_/gzhan yang cung zad rab tu ltung bar byed pa gang yin pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams cung zad yod pa'i ngam grog dang g.yang sa dang 'dra ba de dag rnams kyi drung na yang bag med pa shin tu lhag pa yin te/_ngan song du log par ltung ba rnams nges par yang nyams su 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar bag med pa 'dis ni lha rnams dang /_srog chags su gyur pa'i rnams thams cad dang /_'gro ba lngar skyes par gyur pa rnams dang /_khams gsum du gtogs pa rnams kyang log par ltung bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir thams cad kyis 
[\[285b.2\]]thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pa thams cad kyis/_gnas skabs thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_bde ba 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba 'di yongs su spang bar gyis dang /_'di lta ste bag med pa'o/_/de nas yang de'i tshe na mu su lun d+ha 
[\[285b.3\]]des tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa/_ji ltar/_bag yod pa ni dga' bar brjod/_/bag med sdug bsngal skal ldan yin/_/bag yod bag med pa dag gi/_/'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid brjod/_/de ltar lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag dam pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du ston par byed pa po 
[\[285b.4\]]des lha de dag rnams la rjes su 'doms par byed do/_/de la lha de dag rnams thams cad kyang yid las su rung bar byas pa dang /_dbang po rnams rgyas pa dang /_dbang po rnams rab tu dang ba dang /_yid rtse gcig tu gyur pas nyan par byed cing /_mu su lun d+ha pad ma'i snying po la seng ge'i 
[\[285b.5\]]khri la gnas pa de la 'di ltar yang rjod par byed de/_bdag cag rnams la shin tu phan par gyur pa dang mthar thug par bde ba gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dir brjod lags na/_bdag cag rnams la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyang khyed nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_bdag cag rnams 
[\[285b.6\]]kyis ci bgyi ba yang lha nyid kyi zhal snga nas bka' stsal du gsol/_ji ltar tshig 'di dag rnams brjod pa dang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des 'di skad ces brjod do/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa 'di ni thar pa'i spyod pa rnams rig cing rtogs la mkhyen pa/_skyon rnams thams 
[\[285b.7\]]cad las rnam par grol ba/_yon tan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa sems can rnams thams cad kyi yang gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas de la skyabs su song dang /_sdug bsngal rnams thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur gyis/_de ni bag med pa rnams dang bral ba yin pas de la skyabs 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]su song na gong na med pa'i 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad las yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang nges par mu su lun d+ha'i drung nas lha de dag rnams kyis tshig 'di dag thos pa dang /_thams cad nyid kyis pus mo rnams sa gzhi la btsugs te/_'khor 
[\[286a.2\]]dang bcas pa rnams gus pa legs par skyes pa dang don la dbang po rnams rgyas shing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la legs par gus pa skyes pas mgo bo kun tu btud par gyur pas rab tu phyag 'tshal te/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pas kyang skyabs su song ngo /_/thams cad 
[\[286a.3\]]kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la yang legs par skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/_/yid shin tu rab tu dang ba dang /_bag med pa rnams la yang rnam par smod par byed cing bshags par byed de/_gang dag bag med pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa rnam pa mang 
[\[286a.4\]]por mi bzad pa rnam pa du ma rnams thams cad kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas mu su lun d+ha yang lha de dag rnams kyi yid kun du skyo bar gyur pa de dag rnams legs par mthong nas/_slar nyid kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma rnams byed de/_yud tsam 
[\[286a.5\]]cig la yang rnam pa du mar gcig tu gyur nas brgyar 'gyur ro/_/stong du 'gyur ro/_/stong phrag brgyar yang 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam la yang cha byad du ma dag tu byas pa'i dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam cig la rnam pa du ma'i cha byad dag gis mtshungs par byas pa'i 
[\[286a.6\]]dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam nyid la nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags nas rin po che'i khang bu sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun tu gang ba rnams na gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam la yang chur 'bying bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo 
[\[286a.7\]]bo stong du gyur nas kyang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan dang dpung rgyan 'bar ba rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid can lha'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/_nye ba'i nags rnams thams cad du legs par mthong ngo /_/stong 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]phrag brgyar gsal bar byed pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/_pad ma chen po de nyid kyi steng du 'byung bar byed pa dang /_rang gi gzi brjid rnams kyis lam mer gyur par lha de dag rnams kyis lus shin tu blta bar dka' ba yin no/_/
[\[286b.2\]]gzhan yang mu su lun d+ha de nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang byed par gyur pa ni/_lha de dag rnams nyid kyi bag med pa kun nas bsnyungs par bya ba'i don du 'di lta ste/_kha nas lha brgya stong kun du 'byung bar byed do/_/kha cig ni khang bu'i steng du zhon nas rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od rnams 
[\[286b.3\]]kyis lus shin tu gsal bar gyur pa rnams so/_/kha cig ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin par gyur pas glu'i rol mo rnams nye bar len par byed pa rnams lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /_cha byad dang /_mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas glu nye bar len pas mu 
[\[286b.4\]]su lun d+ha'i kha nas byung nas 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad ma gzhan dag rnams la nang du zhen nas snyan pa'i glu rnams len par byed pa dang /_rtsi yang lha rdzas kyi ro dang dri dang yang dag par ldan pa dag 'thung bar byed de/_lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis 
[\[286b.5\]]yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang /_gal te na lan stong phrag tu yang mdzes par gyur pa dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i mchog rnams kyis brgyan pa/_rang gi 'od kyi dpal 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/gzhan yang lha gzhan dag rnams rnam pa gzhan 
[\[286b.6\]]gyis mu su lun d+ha de'i kha nas kun tu byung nas 'gro na/_rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa rnams ni rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi bya rnams la mngon par zhon nas dga' bar byed pa dang /_glu yang len par byed pa dang lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis 
[\[286b.7\]]yongs su bskor nas/_rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nyan par byed cing /_bag med pas nye bar 'tsho ba rnams mu su lun d+ha'i kha nas kun tu 'gro'o/_/lha ngo mtshar bar gyur pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs gsal zhing sdug pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan gyis lha rnams sprul par byed pa na/_ji ltar mu su lun d+ha'i kha nas de dag nyid 'gro ba ni ud pa la'i ze ba'i nang du zhon zhing rgyan rgyun bar 'brel pa'i dbus su song nas/_lha rdzas kyi rnga skad yan lag lnga pa nyan par byed cing lha mo'i tshogs rnams 
[\[287a.2\]]kyis yongs su bskor nas lha rdzas kyi btung ba dag 'thung bar byed do/_/glu yang len par byed la lhan cig spyod pa'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag dang /_ci ste lan stong phrag dang lan bye ba phrag rnams su yang gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dpe 
[\[287a.3\]]med pa'i lha'i bu mo mchog rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas dga' bar byed pa lha rdzas kyi nags dang nye ba'i nags su thabs du mas rab tu sgrub par byed do/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas sa gzhi dag bzhin du 'gro bar byed la/_rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag 
[\[287a.4\]]kyang glu de dag rnams nyan par byed do/_/de dag gi drung na yon tan brgyas lhag par snyan par gyur pa/_de dag gi glu dang /_de dag gi gzugs dang /_de dag gi bde ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas rang bzhin du gnas pa'i lha de dag snga na ma 
[\[287a.5\]]mthong ba'i ngo mtshar che ba de dag rnams kun tu mngon par mthong nas/_kha cig ni ngo mtshar ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/_/kha cig ni rab tu dga' bar gyur la/_kha cig ni rmad du byung bar gyur nas ci'i phyir lha de dag rnams ji ltar na 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su 
[\[287a.6\]]lun ng+ha'i kha nas 'gro bar 'gyur/_'di dag ni shin tu yang ya mtshan che'o/_/de ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams sems par byed pa dang phan tshun rjod par yang byed de/_de ltar yang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams byed do/_/gzhan yang mu su lun d+has mchog tu 
[\[287a.7\]]gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gzhan dag byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_kha nas byung ba'i lha de dag las sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa ral pa ring po dang cod pan dang ldan pa shing shun gyi gos can lag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa/_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyan can/_gzi brjid kyi dpal 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]'bar ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i drang srong dag kun tu 'byung ste/_brgya phrag rnams dang de nas lan stong phrag kyang kun tu byung nas/_nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khod nas tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyang bag med pa rnams dang kun nas bral 
[\[287b.2\]]bar bya ba'i don du rjod par byed pa/_ji ltar/_sgyu ma lta bu'i srid pa las/_/g.yo ba'i sems can 'di dag kyang /_/thams cad 'chi ba'i mtha' can gyi/_/dngos pos bag med par ma byed/_/sred pa kun nas 'phel ba yi/_/dga' bar 'gyur ba thams cad la/_/tha 
[\[287b.3\]]mar smad pa'i gnas kyi ni/_/dngos pos bag med par ma byed/_/gang zhig skyes pa mi 'jig pa'i/_/gnas ni yod pa ma yin no/_/gang phyir bde kun 'jig bcas kyis/_/bag med ma byed dngos rnams la/_/gal te yon tan ldan pa yi/_/dga' bar 
[\[287b.4\]]mthong ba 'di thams cad/_/thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba yi/_/srid pas bag med par ma byed/_/bag med dgra bo sdig can 'di/_/dga' ba'i 'dod chags gdul dka' ba/_/dmyal bar myur du 'bab 'gyur ba'i/_/dngos por bag med par ma byed/_/bde 
[\[287b.5\]]ba 'di ni yang dang yang /_/yongs su nyams pa kun du 'byung /_/yang ni thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba'i/_/srid pas bag med par ma byed/_/'og tu bar gyi bskal par ni/_/skye dgu skyon gyis nye bar bcom/_/las kyi lcags sgrog gis bcings nas/_/ji ltar 
[\[287b.6\]]mchil pas nya bzhin du/_/thabs kyi rnam pa tha dad kyis/_/lcags sgrog gcod par nus mod kyi/_/lha dang lha min thams cad kyis/_/las kyi sgrog ni gcod mi nus/_/mthong ba med dang shin tu ring /_/skyes pa rgya che ba yi sgrog_/sred pa'i rgyud ni dam po 'dis/_/gang 
[\[287b.7\]]yang 'ching ba byis pa rnams/_/bdag cag lha rnams thams cad dang /_/mi dang de bzhin lha min med/_/mi rtag nyid las rnam grol min/_/mig med pas kyang mthong ba min/_/las rgya chen po'i rgyun rnams ni/_/shin tu ring bar rab tu 'jug_/ji srid shes 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pas rnam ma bcom/_/de srid du ni sred pa yin/_/lnga yi gtsub shing las gyur pa'i/_/sred pa'i bud shing las byung ba/_/rnam rtog rlung ni stobs po ches/_/dus kyi mes ni shin tu sreg_/byis pa blo gros chung rtag tu/_/sdug bsngal des kyang kun du ldan/_/
[\[288a.2\]]phyin ci log gis yongs 'khrul pas/_/de ni 'gro ba lngar 'khor ro/_/longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/chung ma bu la kun tu chags/_/mi lus nad kyis rnam bcom nas/_/'chi bdag rgyal pos kun du 'dren/_/spyang khus ji ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kun/_/rab dang min 
[\[288a.3\]]pas mngon par 'joms/_/de bzhin 'chi bdag dpung tshogs kyis/_/dang ba min pas mi rnams 'joms/_/mnyam pa med dang khyad 'phags pa'i/_/sdug bsngal srid dang srid par mthong /_/gti mug gis ni yongs bslus pas/_/'jig rten 'di ni skyo ba'ang 
[\[288a.4\]]med/_/shin tu bdag la byams pa gang /_/de kun sdig la rten pa'i mi/_/gang dag bdag la byams min pa/_/de la 'jig rten su mi byams/_/de ltar lha de dag rnams kyi bag med pa kun nas zhi bar bya ba'i don du mu su lun d+ha'i kha nas 'byung bzhin pa'i drang srong 
[\[288a.5\]]rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul nas rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la ston par byed de/_de dag ni mthar thug par phan pa rnams yin no/_/gzhan yang 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag des phan pa gzhan gyi sprul pa gzhan rnams byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_brang du ches mchog tu dga' bar 
[\[288a.6\]]gyur pa'i ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngang ngur dag gis nye bar mdzes par gyur pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu dang ba mchog gi chu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i pad ma'i rdzing bu sprul par byed do/_/de'i pad ma'i rdzing bu de na brgya stong bye ba'i pad ma rnams legs par skyes 
[\[288a.7\]]pa 'di dag rnams ni mtsho chen por gyur pa rnams yin te/_rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa dang dpag tshad brgyar dri zhim po rnams 'byung ba yin no/_/pad ma de dag rnams kyi nang du son pa'i snying po rnams la/_cod pan dang ldan pa'i mgo bo rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]pa'i 'dab ma rnams kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/_rin po che rab kyi mchog gis rgyan du byas pa'i dpung rgyan can rnams 'dug pa la/_rnam pa du mar sna tshogs par rab kyi mchog tu lang tsho la bab par mang po rnams kyis nye bar glu len par byed cing /_seng ge'i 
[\[288b.2\]]khri la nye bar gnas pa la rnga yab dkar po nye bar g.yob par byed pa dang /_mgo bo la me tog gi mchog rnams dang ldan pa'i rjes su spyod pa gzhan rnams kyis mngon par stod par byed par gyur pas rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa 
[\[288b.3\]]rnams kyis mngon par bstod par gyur pa na/_brgya byin la rab tu 'gran par byed pa'i rgyal po brgya stong sprul par byed do/_/gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des rang bzhin pa'i lha rnams la go bar bya ba'i don du 'khor los sgyur ba brgya phrag la 
[\[288b.4\]]'gran par byed pa'i rgyal po brgya phrag stong yang yongs su sprul par byed do/_/gzhan yang gzhan la phan pa rnams la zhugs pas rdzu 'phrul gzhan byed pa ni/_mu su lun d+ha des rang gi lus rnams la sprul par byed pa rnams la dpag tshad brgya pa'i pad ma de dag 
[\[288b.5\]]rnams ni brgya stong bye ba'i 'dab ma dang ldan pa/_rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par bkra ba'i 'dab ma rnams la lha'i bung ba rnams glu nye bar len par gyur pa'i sgra rnams kun du brjod pa/_dga' bar gyur cing mnyan par 'os pa mthong na ches dga' bar gyur 
[\[288b.6\]]pa lha rnams kyi pad ma chen po de'i sgra dag ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro ba yin no/_/yu ba rnams sprul par byed pa ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin rdo rjes legs par gnas pa/_in dra nI la'i rin po che dang ldan pa mdzes pas 'ja' tshon rnams pas kyang ches lhag par dga' 
[\[288b.7\]]ba yin no/_/pad ma chen po de'i nang du zhugs pa na mi'i rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pas/_rnam pa du mar brgyan pa'i lus mchog tu skyid pa rnams thong gshol gyis zhing las kyang byed cing /_zhing gi rnang la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs brjod pa/_ji ltar/_'bras 'dod 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]mi rnams thams cad kyis/_/sa gzhi 'di la zhing las byed/_/'dod la chags pa'i mkhas min rnams/_/'chi ba legs par mthong ba min/_/skad cig skad cig la 'grib pa/_/skye bo 'dod pa'i bsam pas rmongs/_/skad cig skad cig la 
[\[289a.2\]]zad pa'i/_/'du byed go ba yang ma yin/_/mi rnams lang tsho mthar byed pa'i/_/rgas pa'i dbyug pa 'di 'byung ngo /_/nad med lo thog 'joms pa yi/_/nad kyi dbyug pa 'di 'byung ngo /_/'jigs pa'i dbyug pa 'di gsum gyis/_/lhar bcas lha min 'joms byed pa/_/
[\[289a.3\]]byis pa'i 'jig rten blun po 'dis/_/'ong ba mthong ba yang ma yin/_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/sha za klu dang srin po la'ang /_/gson pa mthar ni byed pa'i mchog_/dus kyi dbyug pa 'di 'byung 'gyur/_/skye bo gzhan yang rab bcom nas/_/rang gi skye la chags shing 
[\[289a.4\]]'chums/_/srid gzhan 'gro bas skye gtong yang /_/rmongs pas bcings pa'i skye bo rnams/_/bu dang tsha bo yang tsha dang /_/mi gang de yi rigs gnas pa/_/de dag thams cad med gyur kyang /_/khyod ni chags pas 'ching bar byed/_/de ltar sprul pa de dag gis gzhan 
[\[289a.5\]]la phan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir don du tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa yin no/_/rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thos shing thos par gyur nas kyang yid kyis 'thun par byed do/_/yul rnams la yang shin tu bag med par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gzhan 
[\[289a.6\]]shin tu dka' ba rnams gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des sprul par byed pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad las rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pa dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams ni kha 
[\[289a.7\]]cig yin no/_/kha cig ni kha dog du ma rnams dang dbyibs du ma rnams dang 'gro ba du ma rnams dang ldan pa'i lha dang dri za dang mi dang klu dang lha ma yin dang gzhan dag rnams kyang ste/_rang gi skye ba gnyug mar gnas par gyur pa'i rgyan dang cha byad can rnams kun du 'byung ste/_'thab 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]bral gyi mnga' bdag de'i ba spu'i khung bu rnams thams cad las dang /_lus kyi mtha' rnams ma lus pa nas 'byung ba ni ji ltar rjes su 'thun pa dang gnas skabs ji lta ba dang /_de dag gi rigs rnams dang rjes su spyod pa rnams ji lta ba'i 'khor gyis glu len par byed pa dang 
[\[289b.2\]]gar byed pa dang dgod par byed pa yin no/_/mi rnams ni mi rnams dang rjes su 'tsham par gyur pa'i longs spyod mchog tu yid 'phrog par byed pa rnams dang /_yang dag par ldan pas gar byed pa dang dgod par byed pas kyang mi rnams kyi rgyal po bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod 
[\[289b.3\]]par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang cha byad can gyi klu rnams kyang kha cig ni mgo gcig pa/_kha cig ni mgo gnyis pa/_kha cig ni mgo gsum pa/_kha cig ni mgo bzhi pa/_kha cig ni mgo lnga pa/_kha cig ni mgo drug pa/_kha cig ni mgo bdun 
[\[289b.4\]]pa rnams yin te/_mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i mgo bo rnams yin no/_/rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis mchog tu gsal bar byas pa'i mgo bo can rnams sna tshogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dang /_dgod pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_rtse dga' 
[\[289b.5\]]bas rjes su chags pa'i yid kyis bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do/_/de bzhin du lha ma yin yang brtan pa la sogs pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug pas gzhir gtogs pa rnams sprul par byed do/_/'thab bral gyi bdag po des bskal pa gzhan gyi brgya byin 
[\[289b.6\]]gyi rtsa lag lhan cig rjes su spyod pa rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa/_mchog tu gzugs dang rgyan dang cha byad dang rab tu dang ba'i lha ma yin gyi bu mos rjes su 'brang bar gyur pas/_rnga skad yan lag lnga pa rnams thos nas dga' bar 'gyur bas yid ches su 'brel bas 
[\[289b.7\]]mchog tu skyid pa rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi mnga' bdag rnams kyang khang bu na legs par gnas nas mu su lun d+ha'i lus dang kha nas kun tu 'byung ste/_sprul pa rnams thams cad kyang rtse bar byed bzhin pas mchog tu yang dpe med pa'i bde ba rnams la nye bar longs 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]spyod par byed do/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams kyang sprul par byed de/_sprin dang 'dres pa la sogs pa'i ri chen po bcu la so sor gnas pa rnams/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las nye bar longs spyod par bya ba rnams cung zad 
[\[290a.2\]]kyis chung bar gyur pa'i nags dang nye ba'i nags dang /_rdzing bu dang /_pad ma'i tshal rnams dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba'i klung dang btung ba rnams dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba rnam pa du ma rnams nyams su myong bar gyur pas rtse bar byed pa dang /_gar byed pa 
[\[290a.3\]]rnams kyang mu su lun d+ha'i lus po nyid las kun du 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams kyang rang gi bde ba dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pas mchog gi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis gar byed par gyur pa dang /_glu len par gyur pa dang dgod par gyur pas 
[\[290a.4\]]mu su lun d+ha'i lus nyid las kun du 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du shar phyogs lus 'phags pa'i mi rnams kyi rang gi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /_rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rtse bar gyur pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo /_/cho 'phrul gyi mchog 
[\[290a.5\]]rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des/_de ltar rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mas bag med pa rnams kun nas zhi bar bya ba'i don dang /_gzhan rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du yang sprul pa de dag rnams byed do/_/bag med 
[\[290a.6\]]pas rnam par rgyu bar byed pa'i lha de dag rnams ji ltar na mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur pas sems kyi rgyud 'jam por 'gyur ba yin zhes/_rgyu 'di'i phyir na phun sum tshogs pa rnams ston par byed de/_'dod pa rnams kyi kun nas ro myang ba'i don dang phyi nas ni nyes dmigs 
[\[290a.7\]]rnams bstan par bya'o/_/rnam pa ji srid kyis 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i rgyu 'di dag gis lha rnams sprul pa byas so/_/de la kun nas ro myang bar gyur pa rnams ni ji ltar thos par gyur pa bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]rnams kyi gar dang /_dgod pa dang /_'gying bag dang /_glu dang /_gos rnams dang nye bar longs spyod par bya ba'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnams mid par byed pa dang /_bud med rnams kyis yongs su bsnyen bkur ba dang 'khyud 'phyang byed pa rnams te/_dbang po lnga ka'i nye bar longs 
[\[290b.2\]]spyod pa rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par chags pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di ni 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myong ba zhes brjod do/_/de la nyes dmigs rnams gang dag zhe na/_thob par gyur pa'i 'dod pa gang dag yin pa rnams mngon par 'chums pa sngon du 'gro 
[\[290b.3\]]bas don du gnyer bar byed pa na nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_thun mong ba rnams kyis dbang byas nas rlag par gyur pa'i bral bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma rnams dang /_gzhan dag gis phrogs par gyur pa'am/_rdzas dang ldan pa las 'jig pa lngas nges 
[\[290b.4\]]par 'joms pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/_rgyal po dang chu dang chom rkun pa dang me la sogs pa rnams so/_/sdug bsngal gzhan dag rnams kyi yang gzhi por 'gyur ba yin te/_rtag tu yang dgra rnams kyis mngon par 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang /_rlag gis dogs pa bsrung 
[\[290b.5\]]ba'i 'jigs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyis 'jigs par yang 'gyur ro/_/mngon par zhen pa sngon du song bas gang dag gi yid kyang mya ngan gyis rtag tu gzer zug dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ni lus dang yid kyi 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams yin no/_/'dod pa rnams kyi 
[\[290b.6\]]nyes dmigs des ni 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa na yang byis pa blo dman pa rnams la yi mug pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal ba rnam pa du ma rnams skye bar byed de/_zug gzer 'di dag rnams kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin la/_gzhan yang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes 
[\[290b.7\]]dmigs yod do/_/'di yang gang dag zhe na/_'di lta ste des ma dang bu dag kyang lhan cig tu 'thab cing rtsod par byed do/_/dka' blas kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa de'i rgyus gang dag la spun dang spun rnams lhan cig tu 'thab rtsod byed do/_/gsod pa dang 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]'ching ba rnams kyang phul du phyin par byed do/_/de dag kyang 'dod pa'i rgyu las yin la/_'dod pa rnams kyi don gyis de bzhin du rgyal po dang rgyal po yang lhan cig tu 'thab cing rtsod par byed do/_/g.yul 'gyed par byed do/_/yul ljongs rnams 
[\[291a.2\]]'joms par byed do/_/phan tshun du gsod pa dang 'ching ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi rtse mor phyin par byed do/_/de la de dag nyid thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin pas na/_'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs 'di dag rnams kyang so sor 
[\[291a.3\]]shes par bya'o/_/gang gi phyir 'khor ba rnams thams cad kyi 'ching ba yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa 'di dag rnams bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba yin no/_/de la rgyu 'di dag gis ni 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams la rnam pa du ma dang /_rnam par rtog pa 
[\[291a.4\]]du mas kyang rdzu 'phrul de dag rnams byas so/_/de lta bu dag ni mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams yin te/_gang gzhan dag rnams lta phar zhog gi rgyal po yang rnam pa du ma dang bcas pa'i thabs rnams byed do/_/gang yang mi gzhan dag 'dod pa'i don 
[\[291a.5\]]du rgya mtshor 'jug par byed pa dang /_'khrug pa la lhan cig tu 'jug par byed pa dang /_'ching ba dang mya ngan dang /_ngal dub dang sems khral dang /_'thab rtsod dang 'jig pa la sogs pa'i don med pa rnams kun bzod par byed do/_/de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i 
[\[291a.6\]]don du yin la/_de ltar mi rnams thams cad 'dod pa rnams kyi don du nyes dmigs rnams kun nas bzod par byed do/_/ji ltar na yang lha rnams 'dod pa'i don du nyes dmigs rnams kun kyang bzod par byed pa yin na 'di lta ste/_gang dag lha ma yin rnams dang lhan 
[\[291a.7\]]cig tu g.yul 'gyed par byed pa dang /_rtsod par byed pa dang de dag gi de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no/_/de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsod par byed pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di dag yang 'dod 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no/_/dngos po rnams kho na'i rgyags pa gang yin pa de dag rnams ni 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no/_/de la rgyu 'di rnams kyis kyang sprul pa rnams byas so/_/gang yang klu rnams klu rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par byed cing yul 
[\[291b.2\]]gzhan dag rnams kyang 'jig par byed pa dang /_glog dang thog la sogs pa yang gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no/_/yang gang dag dud 'gro rnams kyang phan tshun du za bar byed pa dang /_gsod pa dang 'ching ba la sogs 
[\[291b.3\]]par byed pa rnams dang /_'thab par yang byed pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin te/_'di yang 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs yin no/_/de bzhin du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyang zas kyi rgyu mtshan gyis sam/_'khrig pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang phan tshun du ral 
[\[291b.4\]]gris gcod par byed pa dang /_de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no/_/gang yang 'dod pa rnams kyis nyes dmigs de dag rnams yin pa'i rgyu mtshan 'di dag gis ni 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des bag med pa dang bral bar bya ba'i don du lha rnams la 
[\[291b.5\]]sprul par byed do/_/de bzhin du dmyal ba rnams kyang phan tshun du mngon par 'joms par byed de/_nyes par byed pa'i las rnams kyis skyes pa gzhan rnams su gang dag dang zhe 'gras par gyur pa de dag rnams rjes su dran par 'gyur la/_rjes su dran nas kyang 'khon de 
[\[291b.6\]]dag rnams ni ral gri rnams kyis phan tshun du las byed par 'gyur ba kho na nye bar gnas pas bdag nyid dang gzhan dag rnams kyang gshog par byed do/_/de ltar yang dmyal ba rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no/_/de la rgyu mtshan 'di dag gis kyang 'dod 
[\[291b.7\]]pa rnams yongs su spong ba'i rgyur 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag de sprul pa gzhan rnams byed pa yin no/_/'gro ba lnga po 'di dag rnams thams cad na ni 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yod pa yin no/_/gang yang 'khor ba las kha phyir phyogs par gyur pa de dag rnams 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]thams cad ni gnas skabs thams cad du 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung bar ston par byed pa dang 'chad par yang byed do/_/de la 'thab bral gyi bdag po des 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba rnams bstan pa yin zhing /_nyes dmigs rnams kyang 
[\[292a.2\]]pad ma'i 'dab ma brgya po dang lha rnams rab tu lhung bar gyur pa rang bzhin pa'i lha rnams la cung zad cig bstan pa yin no/_/rgyas par yang lha dang mi rnams kyi nyes dmigs gzhan dag kyang bdag gis bstan par bya yis/_nyes dmigs rnams legs par bstan 
[\[292a.3\]]nas nges par 'byung ba yang bdag gis bshad par bya ste/_thar pa'i sa bon gyi rgyur gyur pa rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la phan pa'i don du dang bde ba'i don du'o/_/gzhan yang lha de dag rnams la phan pa'i don du mu su lun d+ha des 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnams mngon 
[\[292a.4\]]sum du byed de/_'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnams gzhan rnams su mthong bar gyur pa dang /_gzhan du yang thos par gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de la rgyu mtshan 'dis lha de dag rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs 
[\[292a.5\]]rnams so sor sprul par byed do/_/de nas lha de dag dang lha ma yin dang klu rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la ro myong bar byed pa de dag rnams bstan nas nyes dmigs kun du ston par byed de/_lha dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin de dag rnams nyid kyang dus rnams mdor bsdu ba ji lta ba 
[\[292a.6\]]bzhin du yin pas so/_/de la lha rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dod pa rnam pa du ma rnams la longs spyod nas/_'chi 'pho ba'i dus byung bar gyur pa na de dag rnams ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du ston par byed de/_rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[292a.7\]]la 'di lta ste/_ri'i drung dag nas rnam pa du mar gyur pa byi la dang /_gung dang /_gzig dang /_ser ba cag cag dang /_ce spyang dang /_ri bong dang /_seng ge dang /_phag pa dang /_klu dang /_dom dang /_stag dang /_srin bya dang /_rta dang /_sto ma ra dang /_glang po dang /_khwa ta dang /_su su ka dang /_
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]chu srin dang /_rus sbal dang /_rnga mo rnams kyi gdong gcig pa dang /_gdong gnyis pa dang /_gdong gsum pa dang /_gdong mang por gyur pa de dag rnams/_kha cig gi lag na ni thal ba dang sol me thogs pa'o/_/kha cig gi ni thams cad rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'o/_/kha cig 
[\[292b.2\]]gis ni me'i char 'bebs par byed pa dang /_rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ral gri kun nas 'phen par byed do/_/thon kor kun nas 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra mang po rnams mngon par 'don par gyur pa ni ri dang thog 'bab pa dang mtshungs pa'i 'jigs pa chen po rnam pa du ma rnams yin 
[\[292b.3\]]te/_char 'byung ba'i sprin mthing nag dang mdog 'dra bar 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa de'i mgo bo ni ri dang mnyam par skra rnams dang /_lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa brgya phrag mang po rnams dang /_de bzhin du stong phrag mang po rnams kyis kun nas 
[\[292b.4\]]bskor nas lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang /_ral gri dang /_mdung dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdzogs lag na thogs pa/_'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed pa rnams ri de dag gi khrod rnams nas byung ba nas nges par 'ong bar byed do/_/gang na sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams 
[\[292b.5\]]yod pa der nye bar rgyug par byed do/_/khros pas bzhin dmar po rnam par rol ba nye bar sgyur bar byed pas sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po rnams kyi mdog gi me 'bar ba rnam pa du mar char 'byung ba'i sprin mthing nag gi gseb rnams las bzhin du glog rnam par 'byin pas 
[\[292b.6\]]nges par rgyug par byed do/_/sprul pa gzhan rnams kha cig ni 'chi bdag lta bur gyur pas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs rnams kyis gang na sprul pa de dag rnams yod par rgyug par byed pa ni sna tshogs pa'i zhags pa dang /_lag cha thogs pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_
[\[292b.7\]]lcags kyi rang bzhin las lag pa gyen du rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'brug bzhin du sgra kun nas sgrog par byed pa lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi gzugs can rnams so/_/kha cig ni mig brgya pa rnams so/_/kha cig ni mig bzhi brgya pa rnams so/_/
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]de bzhin du lnga pa dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang dgu dang mig brgya phrag bcu pa rnams te/_mig rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam pa rnams rab tu 'ong bar byed do/_/kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_sngo skya rnams dang dbyibs 
[\[293a.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs par gyur pa/_'byung po rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/_hA hA zhes sgrogs par byed pas kyang de dag thams cad ri'i rtse mo 'dud pa'i sgra dang 'dra bar so sor gsus pa 'phyang ba dang /_gsus pa gzhan dag rnams ni ri dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i 
[\[293a.3\]]gsus pa dang /_ri dang mtshungs pa'i mgo bo can rnams yin no/_/mgo bo thung ngu dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan rnams ni ring bar rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i skra dang lag pa ring por gyur pa dang /_sen mo rnams rab tu 'bar ba dang /_de bzhin du lus la skyes pa'i ba spu rnams kyang ste/_
[\[293a.4\]]nye 'khor kun nas rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i ri dang mnyam pa rnams dus kyi ri chen po de las sprul pa byas pa rnams nges par 'ong ba yin te/_rdo rje'i thog 'bab par byed pa nye 'khor kun nas 'bebs par byed pa yin no/_/yang rnam pa gzhan dag rnams kyis de bzhin du 
[\[293a.5\]]'chi bdag gi pho nya nye bar rgyug par byed pa rnams ni nye 'khor rnams na bya rgod dang /_khwa ta dang /_kang ka dang /_ce spyang dang /_rnga mo'i gdong can rnams lus po khrag gis rnam par byugs pa dang /_grog ma 'phungs pa'i lus can gyi lha de dag rnams mngon par mi dga' ba 
[\[293a.6\]]rnams nges par yod par byed pa yin no/_/dus kyi ri chen po de dag las sprul pa byas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang gang na lha sprul pa'i lha de rnams yod par der rlung gi shugs chen pos btab pa bzhin du sprin nag po glog dang bcas pas myur bar rgyug par byed do/_/de 
[\[293a.7\]]nas 'chi bdag lta bur byed par gyur pa de dag rnams kyis lha de dag rnams dang nye bar 'ongs par gyur nas sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams mngon par 'dzin par byed do/_/de'i gting la kha cig ni rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i lcags kyi thag pa rnams kyis dpung pa bcings nas 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]'dren par byed do/_/de bzhin du sprul pa'i lha gzhan de dag rnams kyis de dag rnams nyid 'khrid par gyur pa mngon par mthong nas/_shin tu 'jigs par gyur pas phan tshun kun du rgyug par byed do/_/de dag rnams kyang 'dzin par byed de/_'chi bdag gi pho nya ni mgo 
[\[293b.2\]]la mngon par dmigs nas/_de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'jigs par byed pa'i nga ro dag kun du bton pas mig gi yul nges par 'phyong bar byed do/_/kha cig ni lha gzhan ma de dag rnams nyid bzung nas lcags kyi rang bzhin gyi rab tu 'bar ba'i thag pa 
[\[293b.3\]]rnams kyis mgrin pa bcings shing khyer te/_sa gzhi'i gseb tu rjes su thim nas mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed do/_/'chi bdag gi pho nya sprul pa byas pa gzhan de dag rnams kha cig gis kyang sprul pa'i lha rnams khyer nas chur spying bar byed de/_rab tu khros par gyur pas 
[\[293b.4\]]nang du nub par gyur to/_/de ltar rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du ma rnams su sprul pa de dag rnams ni 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa rnams yin no/_/rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis kyang de dag rnams thams cad rmi lam gyi snang ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur te/_'di dang 'di 
[\[293b.5\]]dag rnams ni ci yin zhes go bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de nas de dag gang gi tshe sprul par gyur pa'i lha rnams la dmigs pa na de'i tshe/_sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag rnams kyis rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa rnams ni/_ji ltar/_longs spyod rgyags 
[\[293b.6\]]pas rgyags pa yi/_/bag med dbang gis 'jug pa rnams/_/rmongs pa rnams kyi dus song nas/_/'chi bdag dus su 'ongs pa yin/_/nags kyi dus 'di mtha' yas pa/_/dug gis gang ba ji bzhin nags/_/sred pa'i myu gu rnam spangs pa/_/dge ba don gnyer 
[\[293b.7\]]kun nas spangs/_/mdzes pa'i las ni ma byas par/_/bag med pas kyang bag med 'gyur/_/'chi bdag 'jigs pa'i dus byung na/_/blo gros ngan pa ci byar yod/_/sred pa'i chur ni nub pa gang /_/sdug bsngal pha rol tu phyin min/_/rga dang 'chi bar bying ba gang /_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]bde ba de dag rnams la med/_/skyes pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi/_/rgyab na 'chi bdag nges par gnas/_/ci yi don du 'jig rten 'di/_/bag med pas ni bag med byed/_/nyams pa med dang rnam mi shes/_/rtag tu glags gcod stobs po che/_/'chi 
[\[294a.2\]]bdag dmag dpung shugs po che/_/'jig rten pas kyang go ba min/_/rtag tu rnam par 'gal 'gyur dang /_/bzlog thabs med pa nyid kyang yin/_/sems can thams cad 'chi ba yang /_/bag med pas ni ma go 'o/_/'chi bdag gir gyur 'jig rten gsum/_/nye 
[\[294a.3\]]'khor kun du rnam par dpyod/_/rga dang na dang rgud pa yang /_/byis pa rnams kyis rig pa min/_/de ltar sprul pa'i 'chi bdag gi pho nyar gyur pa de dag gis sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams la rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams brjod nas/_lan brgya 
[\[294a.4\]]phrag rnams su dang lan stong phrag rnams su yang srid pa rnams su 'khrid par byed cing de bzhin du 'dren par byed do/_/sdug bsngal chen po de dag rnams mthong bar gyur pas kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag gis bag med pa las shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba spangs nas/_
[\[294a.5\]]yid 'byung bar 'gyur zhing thams cad kyang rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur to/_/de dag rtogs nas gzhan yang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams kyi yid gzhan yang ji lta ba bzhin du las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir slar nyid kyang 
[\[294a.6\]]sprul pa gzhan rnams sprul par byed pa ni/_lha de dag rnams nyid kyi phyir zhing nyid kyang khyad par du rtogs nas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams la/_'di lta ste dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dod pa rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po gang yin pa de dag rnams mu su 
[\[294a.7\]]lun d+ha'i lus las nges par 'byung ste/_lhan cig spyod par byed pa'i mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa rnams ni sngar kho na bzhin no/_/de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa de srid kyi gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis kyang phun sum 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]tshogs par gyur nas phyi nas yang rgyal po rnams lus gog por song ba/_mgo bo kun skra dkar rnams kyis g.yogs par gyur pa/_lus po rnams kun nas 'khums pa/_lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar rnams kyis kun du gang ba lus dbyug pa la kun nas 
[\[294b.2\]]rten pa mchog tu rjud par gyur pa'i lus po can rnams las rnam pa thams cad la nus pa med par gyur pa/_gzhan la kun nas rten nas 'gro bar byed pa/_skye bo rnams thams cad bzhad gad du gyur pa sgra ngar ngar por gyur pa'i dbugs phyir 'byung ba lus kun la bsnye bas 
[\[294b.3\]]nyams par byas pa/_dbang po rnams shin tu rnyings par gyur pa thams cad la yang spro ba med pa/_skye bo rnams thams cad skyug zlog par byed pa/_'khyor zhing 'gro bar gyur pa dus shin tu nye bar gyur pa de dag rnams mtsho 'di nyid na rgyu bar byed de/_stobs shin tu yang chung bar 
[\[294b.4\]]gyur pa gzhan dag gi lag pa la 'phyangs nas gom pa rnams 'bor bar byed pa shin tu yang 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/de dang de ltar rgyu bar byed pa rnams kyi lus rnams la dus gzhan 'ga' zhig gi tshe na/_gzugs mang po rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[294b.5\]]pa'i nad rnams kun du skye ba ni/_rims tsha ba dang /_ha cang thal ches par 'khru ba dang /_glo lu ba dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skyigs bu dang /_skrang glo dang /_mdze sngon du 'gro bar gyur pa rnams kyis shin tu mi bzad par gyur pa/_nye bar 'tshe ba rnams dang bcas pa/_'chi 
[\[294b.6\]]ba'i mthar thug par byed pa/_shin tu skyug bro bar gyur pa'i nad khyad par du drag po de dag rnams kun du 'byung bar gyur pa'i stobs kyis/_gso dpyad med pa dang mi 'dod pa rnams mthar thug par byas pas rgyal po de dag rnams thams cad nyid khrid par gyur nas shin tu sdug 
[\[294b.7\]]bsngal ba kho nar 'chi bar byed do/_/shi ba de dag rnams kyi lus de dag rnams zags shing dri mi zhim par gyur pa la srin bu brgya stong gis khyab par gyur pas za bar byed bzhin pa'i lus de dag rnams rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas gang 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dag gis de dag gi lus rnams 'dzin par byed pa'i sprul pa'i bya rnams kyang kun du 'ongs par gyur nas kha cig gis ni za bar byed do/_/kha cig gis ni bzung bar gyur pa mthong nas 'bros par byed de/_de dag rnams kyang mchog tu skyo ba skye bar 'gyur 
[\[295a.2\]]ba'i gnas su legs par mthong bas lha rang bzhin pa de dag rnams shin tu legs par mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang lha de dag rnams nyid la phan par bya ba'i don du 'thab bral gyi bdag po brtan pas mgo drangs pa'i lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gang 
[\[295a.3\]]yin pa de dag rnams sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug par gyur pa'i sa 'og na gnas pa de dag rnams gang gi tshe mu su lun d+ha las mi ring ba na kun nas gnas par gyur la/_de'i tshe rnam par khros par gyur pas kyang thams cad kyi skad chen po kun du bton zhing phan tshun du yang 
[\[295a.4\]]bos par gyur nas sa gzhi la kun nas 'gyel ba ni sta res shing kar Ni kA ra sta res rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur to/_/'gyel nas kyang shi bar gyur pas thams cad shing dang rdo ba rnams bzhin du rnam par 'gyur ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[295a.5\]]dag rnams mngon par mthong nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir nas kyang rnam par khro bar byed pa dang ngu bar yang byed do/_/yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de dag rnams thams cad kyang de ltar ngu bar byed pa rnams la bya dag kun du 'ong 
[\[295a.6\]]bar gyur nas de dag gis de dag rnams kyi lus shing skam dang rdo ba dang shing bu dang mtshungs par byed pa med pa rnams kun nas 'dren par byed do/_/snying rje rnam par 'khrugs par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams de nas de ltar rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rting 
[\[295a.7\]]thogs nyid la de dag rnams thams cad kyang shi bar gyur to/_/de dag rnams kyi ro de dag rnams kyang bya rnams nyid kyis 'dzin par byed do/_/bzung bar gyur nas kyang khwa ta dang 'ug pa dang bya rgod rnams nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/_mthong ba'i yul 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]las 'das nas 'gro bar byed do/_/de ltar yang 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du sprul pa gzhan rnams kyang phul du phyin par byas so/_/de'i rjes thogs la sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa rnams la ji ltar gang de klu'i 
[\[295b.2\]]rgyal po rnams gang yin pa de dag gi sprul pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/_/yang de dag rnams kyi mi rtag pa 'di dag ston par byed pa las de ltar yang klu rnams kha cig ni bye tshan dag gis sreg par byed do/_/sol ba'i me tsha ba rnams kun du 'bab par 'gyur zhing de dag rnams 
[\[295b.3\]]bab par gyur pas kyang de ltar sreg par byed do/_/ji ltar seng ldeng gi me shin tu chen po rnams su rtswa 'jag skam po cig lhung ba sreg par byed pa de bzhin du lhung bar gyur pa tsam nyid na klu de dag rnams bye tshan gyis sreg par byed do/_/de dag rnams las gzhan pa'i klu rnams kyang 
[\[295b.4\]]'chi bdag gis 'khrid par 'gyur te/_lhan cig spyod par byed pa rnams kyi nang na gnas pa las rnam par khros par gyur bzhin du de dag rnams dus kyi 'khor los sdud par byed do/_/gzhan rnams kha cig ni phan tshun du 'gyed par gyur pas phan tshun du bcings nas snying 
[\[295b.5\]]phan tshun du 'joms par byed do/_/de ltar 'chi bdag rnams kyis kun du khrid par gyur pa'i sprul pa pa'i klu de dag rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/mthong nas kyang phyir zhing kho na shin tu nges par yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 
[\[295b.6\]]'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po de nyid kyis sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa ni ji ltar shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang /_ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams kyang rgas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/lhan cig rjes su spyod pa'i 'khor dang 
[\[295b.7\]]bcas pa rnams lan brgya dang stong du yang byed do/_/shi ba de dag rnams nyid kyi lus de dag rnams las srin bu rnams kyis gang bar gyur par shin tu 'jigs su rung bar sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur pa dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/rnam pa 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mar yang srin bu'i skyon phul du phyin pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'chi ba mngon par mthong nas/_rang bzhin gyi lha de dag mchog tu yid byung ba dang ldan par gyur nas/_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di ni nges par bslang ba yin te/_de ltar yang 
[\[296a.2\]]srog chags su gyur pa gang yin pa 'di dag rnams thams cad kyang rga ba dang nad dang 'chi ba rnams kyis mthar thug par byed pa yin pa rab tu mi shes na/_de dag rnams kyang gang du song gang gis khrid par gyur pa yin/_phun sum tshogs pa rnams thams cad ni mi rtag pa 
[\[296a.3\]]yin pa dang /_bde ba rnams thams cad kyang srid pa'i skyon dang kun du 'dres pa'i 'dus byas zhes bya ba g.yo ba mthar 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis yid ches par mi bya'o/_/rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can 'di dag 
[\[296a.4\]]rnams thams cad la 'di dang srid pa gzhan du yang bde ba yod pa ma yin no/_/mchog tu skyo ba skyes pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i legs par skyo ba skyes pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams de ltar phan tshun du rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po 
[\[296a.5\]]des de dag rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba de dag rig par gyur nas sprul pa gzhan yang byed par gyur pa las/_de nas skyes bu gang dag nga med pa nga'i ba med par gyur pa/_nges par gong du 'gro ba de dag rnams ni/_'di lta ste gang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa 
[\[296a.6\]]gang yin pa rnams te/_de dag rnams ni lha rnams kyi drung na cung zad pa cig gis chung ba'i mchog tu skyid par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rnams kyang rgas pa dang nad kyis gzir bar gyur nas 'chi bdag gi zhags pas 'dren par byed do/_/shin tu 'jigs su rung 
[\[296a.7\]]ba'i lus rnams la srin bu brgya stong gis kun nas g.yogs par gyur pa/_lus po 'di dag la skye bo rnams thams cad kyis blta bar rjes su mi 'thun pa/_bshang ba'i phung po rnams kyis kun du gang bar gyur pa'i byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa 'di dag rnams so/_/
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]de ltar bde ba rgya chen po'i sa na gnas pa'i 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams kyi mi rtag pa nyid 'thab bral gyi bdag po 'dis bstan pa yin no/_/de'i rjes thogs la gang dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong 
[\[296b.2\]]bar sprul pa gzhan dag rnams byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_srid pa bar ma do pa'i tshogs rnam pa du ma rnams so/_/ji ltar shi bar gyur nas sems can rnams las sna tshogs pa rnams kyi dbang gis dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba de 
[\[296b.3\]]bzhin du srid pa bar ma do pa rnams sprul pa byed de/_ji ltar 'gro ba lnga po rnams kun du rgyu bar byed pa rnams lha rang bzhin pas mngon sum nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la las du ma rnams las sems kyi tha ma'i bsam pa'i dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[296b.4\]]de las rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams nyid nges par skyo bar bya ba'i don du rnam pa du mar lan brgya stong du skye dgu rnams 'gro ba lngar skye ba sprul par byed do/_/mtsho de nyid du bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ngo mtshar ba gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba de dag rnams mngon par mthong 
[\[296b.5\]]zhing rang bzhin gyis lha de dag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la yang 'gro ba lngar kun du rgyu bar byed pa'i 'byung po rnams thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dbang gis drangs par gyur pas 'gro ba gzhan nas 'gro ba gzhan rnams su dmyal 
[\[296b.6\]]ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_lha dang mi'i 'gro ba rnams la yongs su 'khyam par gyur pa la ni skyabs med pa dang grogs med par gyur pas srid pa gzhan rnams brje bsor byed pa/_dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du brje 
[\[296b.7\]]bsor byed pa rnams mthong ngo /_/de la srid pa bar ma do pa rnams kyi ya mtshan che bar gyur pa shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_kun nas shin tu 'jigs par byed pa mchog tu skyo ba skye bar byed pa thams cad la rab tu 'jigs par byed par gyur pa de dag rnams rang bzhin gyi 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lha rnams nyid kyi de lta bu'i srid pa bar ma do pa mthong ba las/_'thab bral ba'i lha'i rigs rnams las las zad par gyur nas rab tu lhung bar gyur pa na/_'gyod pa'i mes sreg par byed pa bag med pa 
[\[297a.2\]]rnams kyis de de ltar shin tu bslus nas mgo bo thur la dpyangs pas rab tu lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi 'pho bar gyur pa na lha gang yin pa'i rgyud des yongs su bzung ba'i phung po de dag rnams ni nye bar nub par 'gyur ro/_/rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra bar srid pa bar 
[\[297a.3\]]ma do pa de'i 'gro ba rnams kyi phung po rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas par gyur pa de dang 'khor bas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa kun nas slong ba'i 'jigs pa chen po dang gzer zug chen por yang gyur pa rnams mngon par mthong nas/_
[\[297a.4\]]'thab bral gyi rang bzhin pa de dag rnams mchog tu skyo ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dmyal ba pa rnams kyi srid pa bar ma do ni mthong bar 'gyur la/_skye ba'i srid pa rnams ni mu su lun d+ha 'dis legs par ston par mi byed do/_/rgyu gang gi phyir na lha de dag rnams 
[\[297a.5\]]kyis bzod par mi nus pa'i phyir te/_sems shin tu 'jam pa yin pas skad cig nyid la dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/lha de dag gis dpe med pa'i sdug bsngal 'di rnams mngon par mthong bar byed pa yin no/_/rgyu 'di dag gis sprul pa byas pas 'thab 
[\[297a.6\]]bral gyi bdag po de legs par ston par byed do/_/de ltar lha de dag rnams dmyal bar rab tu lhung bar gyur pa lha gzhan rang bzhin pa de dag rnams kyis rnam par lta bar byed do/_/gzhan yang mu su lun d+ha des ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sprul pa 'di dag rnams 
[\[297a.7\]]byas pas srid pa bar ma do pa rnams ston par byed pa ni ji ltar bag med pa gang kho na'i skyon gyis/_nye bar bcom pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams las zad nas 'chi 'pho ba ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye'o/_/de dag gi srid pa bar ma de dag rnams ni las byas pa de dag dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]gzugs brnyan du 'gyur te/_las kyis thag pa ring po rnams kyis drangs par gyur pas mgo thur du dpyangs nas ltung bar 'gyur bas gang la des byas pa'i las kyis 'tshed par byed pa de la de dag kun nas 'khrid do/_/rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis 
[\[297b.2\]]de ltar srid pa bar ma do pa gnyis pa rnams mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang sprul pa pa'i srid pa bar ma do pa gsum pa rnams mthong ba ni ji lta ba kho nar 'thab bral ba rnams gzhan yang las zad pa nyid bag med pas nye bar bcom nas mgo thur du bltas shing rab tu lhung bar 
[\[297b.3\]]gyur pa dang /_shin tu nyam nyes pa dang kun nas bcings pas kyang dud 'gro rnams su skye'o/_/de dag gi srid pa bar ma do pa rnams ni de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra ba nyid du skye bar gyur pa yin te/_dud 'gro rnams kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa dang 
[\[297b.4\]]rnam pa du mar gyur pa de dag rnams dang 'dra ba'i srid pa bar ma do pa rnams su 'gyur ro/_/rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra bar gyur pa de yang 'gro ba gsum pa rnams kyis kun nas bsdus pa'i srid pa bar ma do pa shin tu skrag par byed pa de dag rnams mngon par mthong nas/_slar yang lha de 
[\[297b.5\]]dag rnams ches phal che bar skyo bar gyur cing mchog tu kun nas skrag par gyur pas nye 'khor kun na 'jigs pa des khong dngangs par gyur pa'i bzhin gyis phan tshun rnams su mngon par mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa/_ji ltar/_rnam par shes dka' 
[\[297b.6\]]shin tu phra/_/thams cad du ni rgyug pa po/_/sems can las kyi dbang 'gro ba/_/thams cad du ni yongs su rgyug_/gang dag 'phags pa la skur 'debs/_/gang yang las 'bras la sdang ba/_/de dag shi nas dmyal bar 'gro/_/gang yang log par 
[\[297b.7\]]'dul ba po/_/gang zhig nang du sdig sbas nas/_/gang yang chos gzhan gyis slu ba/_/shin tu sdig can 'jig rten de/_/dmyal ba'i rtse mo'i skal ldan yin/_/bde ba kun chags gzhan gang dang /_/skye bo rtag tu sdig dga' ba/_/rang gi sems kyis bslus 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]nas ni/_/de ni bde nas sdug bsngal 'gro/_/gang zhig mthar thug bder mthong ba/_/bde de mtshon char brjod pa yin/_/gang yang sdug bsngal rnam smin 'gyur/_/bde de sdug bsngal kho na nyid/_/bag med pa yi lha rnams ni/_/'thab bral srid pa nas 'chi 'pho/_/de 
[\[298a.2\]]phyir chos srog gang gi phyir/_/mkhas pas rab tu bsngags par byed/_/khang bu skyed mos tshal dga' zhing /_/ched cher bud med rnams la lta/_/'dod pa'i yul gyis ngoms med par/_/lha ni sa la ltung ba yin/_/ji ltar bde ba 'phel ba ni/_/skom pa 'phel ba de bzhin no/_/skom pa las 
[\[298a.3\]]ni mchog tu ni/_/mkhas pa las ni rab tu brjod/_/'jig rten skye dang 'chi mthong nas/_/mchog tu skyo ba mi skye ba/_/de la bde legs skyabs gang yod/_/gang yang skyob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis rnam pa du ma'i srid pa bar ma do pa de dag rnams mngon 
[\[298a.4\]]par mthong bar gyur pa dang rab tu skyo ba'i yid kun du skyes so/_/de dag rnams kyi sems de dag mngon par mthong nas 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun d+ha des sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams thams cad kyis snang bar byas nas/_legs par phrad par byed do/_/zhi ba rgyas pa'i cha byad de mngon 
[\[298a.5\]]par mthong nas lha de dag rnams dbugs phyin cing yid phebs par gyur nas/_'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag mgon po de gang na yod pa der yongs su bskor nas kun du gnas te/_gus pa legs par skyes pas khyab par tshim pa'i yid kyis thams cad nyid de na gnas so/_/skyo 
[\[298a.6\]]ba'i yid kyis bdag nyid mgon dang bcas pa de bzhin du de dag rnams kyis rtogs so/_/de la rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mar mthong na ngo mtshar bar gyur pa rnams rang gis mthong bas tshim pa med pa'i yid kyis kun dga' ba mthong ba lta bur gyur pa de yongs su bskor nas rang bzhin 
[\[298a.7\]]gyi lha de dag rnams gnas so/_/de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams la 'di skad ces brjod de/_khyed cag rnams nags dang nye ba'i nags dang pad ma'i rdzing bu dang rin po che'i khams rnams dang ldan pas rnam par brgyan pa'i ri'i rtse mo rnams nyid la yang gar gyis shig ces 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]nyams su blang bar bya ba'i don du rjod par byed kyang /_ci yang lha de dag rnams skyo bar gyur pa'i yid legs par skyes pa'i phyir dang bag med pa rnams bsnyungs par bya ba'i yid can rnams byed pa yin nam/_de nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyi 'thab bral gyi bdag po'i drung nas tshig de dag thos nas rang 
[\[298b.2\]]bzhin gyi lha de dag sems rab tu skyo bar gyur pas 'di skad ces brjod de/_lha lags nags dang nye ba'i nags dang rin po che'i khams dang ldan pas brgyan pa rnams la bdag cag ji ltar ci'i phyir dga' bar 'gyur/_lha rnams mtshor bying ba bzhin du bdag gis 'khor ba'i brel tog rnams rnam 
[\[298b.3\]]par rtog pa du mas kyang bsran par mi tshugs pa rnams rang gi mig sngar mthong ste/_'dod pa rnams thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal gyi mthar gtugs par byed pa bdag cag rnams rtag pa ma yin brtan pa ma yin ther zug ma yin te/_de dag rnams la snying po cung zad kyang med do/_/de nas 
[\[298b.4\]]'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams kyi drung nas tshig gi cha 'di dag rnams thos nas 'di skad ces brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bar 'di dag rnams thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin par gsungs so/_/de nas lha de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces brjod 
[\[298b.5\]]de/_bdag cag rnams thams cad ni ji lta ba bzhin du de la yid song ba lags na/_ji ltar shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams lha'i zhal snga nas shes par 'tshal lo/_/de nas de dag gi drung nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag des tshig de dag rnams thos nas 'di skad ces brjod de/_
[\[298b.6\]]ji ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa de dag rnams ngas brjod par nus mod kyis kyang re zhig ngas khyed rnams la phyogs gcig tsam mngon par brjod par bya ste/_'khor ba rnams su ji lta bar bag med pa'i dbang gis 'gro bar ma gyur na ni/_bskal pa bye ba stong phrag du ma rnams na/_
[\[298b.7\]]kye ma dka' blas kyis bde 'gro'i 'gro bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_'gro ba gnyis po lha dang mi dang rnyed pa ni shin tu dka' ba yin zhing /_gang dag bag med pa'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rnams ni mkhas pa yin no/_/rkyen gyi dbang gis byung ba rnams kyang yongs su spong 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]bar byed do/_/de dag gi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang byol song rnams su de dag skye'o/_/de la kye ho lha rnams 'gro ba gsum po rnams ngan song zhes mngon par brjod do/_/lha dang mi'i 'gro ba gnyis po ni bde 'gro 
[\[299a.2\]]zhes mngon par brjod do/_/de dag rnams nyid re zhig ji ltar rab tu stobs che bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal dag mngon par brjod par mi nus so/_/rgyas par ni ston pas mngon par brjod par spyod do/_/mdor bsdu bar gyur na lha dang mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni 
[\[299a.3\]]rnam pa bcu drug go/_/yang lha dang mi rnams kyi de yang gang dag yin na/_bde 'gro'i 'gro bas bsdus pa'i sdug bsngal du gyur pa rnams la/_'di lta ste srid pa bar ma do'i sdug bsngal dang mngal na gnas pa'i ya nga ba'i sdug bsngal dang mngal nas kun du 
[\[299a.4\]]'byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang zas kyi sdug bsngal dang 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal dang mi 'thun pa rnams dang kun du phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang sdug pa rnams dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pas bcings pa'i sdug bsngal dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[299a.5\]]dang gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal dang tshol khro'i sdug bsngal dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dre bar byed pa'i sdug bsngal dang bu dang bu mo dang gnyen 'dun rnams kyi brel dog gi sdug bsngal dang bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang dbang chung ba'i sdug 
[\[299a.6\]]bsngal dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang lhag par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu sdug bsngal bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba ni 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal lo/_/ji ltar rab tu stobs che ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bcu drug po de dag rnams ni mi'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yin te 'chi ba'i 
[\[299a.7\]]mthar thug pa rnams mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyi yin no/_/gang sems can gzhan dag rnams la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_shin tu yang bsran par mi bzod pa rnams yin no/_/gang yang mthar 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]thug pa kho nar zad par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang rab tu 'jig par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi bde ba ni 'di dang srid pa gzhan rnams na yang med do/_/de la re zhig dang po kho nar srid pa bar ma dor skyes pa'i dri za srid pa bar ma do pa'i tha snyad can rnams kyi rnam pa ji lta bu'i 
[\[299b.2\]]sdug bsngal yin na 'di lta ste/_las kyi rlung gis btab par gyur pa rnams sha'i mig gis mngon sum du blta bar byar med par lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa dang /_thogs pa med par gyur pa'i rang bzhin can de yang gang gi tshe mir skye bar 'gyur ba yin pa de'i tshe/_ji 
[\[299b.3\]]lta bu'i rnam par 'di skye bar 'gyur ba rnams dang rnam pa ji lta bu'i khyim du 'di skye bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang ste/_dman pa dang bar ma dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyim rnams su sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang shes rab kyi 'bras bu can rnams la skye bar 'gyur ba na/_dri za de yang 
[\[299b.4\]]rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ba yin no/_/srid pa bar ma do pa 'di'i zas kyi rigs su gyur pa rnams ni/_gal te dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur na de'i zas rnams hrud hrud po dang /_mdog ngan pa dang dri dang ro dang reg dang tshad rnams kyang dman par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa'i mthu 
[\[299b.5\]]chung bar gyur pa'i phyir na skye ba na yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di ni mir skye bar gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi dang po yin no/_/de nas skyes par gyur nas las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mngal na gnas par gyur te/_dbul po'i khyim du skye bar 
[\[299b.6\]]'gyur na ma'i zas ngan pa dang /_gyong po dang skyur mo'i zas rnams dang zas [{]chungs [,]chung [}]par gyur na yang sha ma la rab tu brten pas lte ba'i sbubs nas rab tu spel bar byed pa'i srog chags mngal na gnas pa kha dog ngan pa dang lus rid par 'gyur ba yin no/_/ma'i 
[\[299b.7\]]lus g.yo bar gyur pa'i skyon gyis shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pas gsus pa'i gseb na rgyug par byed do/_/zas su gyur pa grang ba dang dro ba dag gis byas pas kyang ste/_de ltar gzir bar byed pa mnar ba'i mchog tu phyin pa la yang go skabs ye med pa skabs 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]med pa rnam par khro bar byed pa na yang spungs med pa/_gcin dang rtug pa'i phung po chen po'i nang du bying bar gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa du ma rnams yod do/_/de la 'di ni gzhan gnyis pa yin te/_bde 'gro ba rnams kyang de 'dra na dmyal 
[\[300a.2\]]ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzhan yang sdug bsngal gsum pa yod de/_de'i rjes thogs la gal te mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba na ma'i skye gnas kyi bug pa'i zur ma mig nas gzir bar gyur pa ni/_ji ltar bu ram gyi shing 'khrul mig 
[\[300a.3\]]gi bu gu nas 'byung ba na btsir bar gyur pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mngal gyi de yang ma'i skye gnas kyi bu ga nas kun du 'byung ba yin no/_/de la 'di ni mngal nas skye ba ste sdug bsngal gzhan yin no/_/de dag gi rjes thogs la sdug bsngal bzhi pa yod de/_mar sar 
[\[300a.4\]]pa dang chu shing gi lo ma ltar shin tu 'jam par gyur pa'i lus rab tu smin pa gzhon sha can gyi dper gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa rnams gang gi tshe btsas pa na ma mas rtsub pa dang rod rod po dang rdol ba dang mdog ngan pa dang las su mi rung ba dang rid pa dang /_bar mig can 
[\[300a.5\]]mthug pa dang rtse mo dang sgra mi snyan pa dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis len par byed pa de'i tshe ji ltar mes sreg par byed pa'am/_ral gris gtub par byed pa de bzhin du shin tu 'jam pa'i phyir na 'di la yang zug gzer skyed do/_/de'i lus shin tu 'jam por gyur pa 'di 
[\[300a.6\]]gal te dang por gos 'jam po rnams bskon par gyur kyang de dag rnams ni ji ltar bslangs pa dang mthug pa dang rtsub pa dang rdol ba dang rab tu rnyings pa dang btsems pa dang bskums pa rnams kyi nang du lus bcug pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/grang ba'i dus su 'di yang shin tu grang 
[\[300a.7\]]bar 'gyur te/_btsas pa na khyim gang yin par ni grang bas shin tu yang nyen par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshad pa'i dus su tshad pa shin tu stobs che bar 'gyur te/_gang gis shin tu sreg par byed pa sbyin pa dman pa nyid kyi phyir na mnar bar 'gyur ro/_/nang du yang 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]bsregs pas sdug bsngal gyis ma'i skye gnas nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sbyin pa dman pa yin pa'i phyir na de'i rjes thogs la zas kyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_nu ma dag gi dang zas za bar byed pa na yang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/re zhig nu ma dag 
[\[300b.2\]]ni ma zas nyung bar gyur pas de'i nu zho rnams kyang nyung bar 'gyur te/_gang gis shin tu rid pa dang mdog nyams pa dang mdog ngan pa dang rjud par gyur pa dang rgyus pa dang rus pa dang pags pa rnams kyi lhag ma tsam du gyur pa'i lus bkres par gyur pa nad rnams 'dren 
[\[300b.3\]]par byed pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rten du mi bzod pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/_/de nas dus gzhan na zas dang skom bag tsam yod par gyur na yang /_de de kho na bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pas yongs su bcom pa'i phyir dri dang ro dang 
[\[300b.4\]]reg bya rnams chung zhing dman pa dang gzhan rnams kyi zas kyis te/_gal te shed na srog kun nas gtong ba'am shin tu rid pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yin pas yang gal te na nu ma zas su za bar 'gyur te/_ji lta bar mdzes pa ni lus ltad mor che bas srog 
[\[300b.5\]]'dzin par byed pa yin no/_/de ltar 'di'i sbyin pa ngan pa yin pa'i phyir na 'di'i ma lus pa kun yang rab tu zad par 'gyur ba yin no/_/des na yang zas bsod par 'gyur ba rnams kyis 'di'i gsus pa legs par tshim par gyur pa yin na yang /_de ltar na yang zas 
[\[300b.6\]]kyis byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen por 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rjes thogs la 'di'i sdug bsngal lnga pa yod pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_'dod pas byas pa rnams so/_/de de ltar zas kyis byas pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzir bar gyur pa na 'di la rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[300b.7\]]pa rnams su rgyu bar bya ba'i 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lto bkres pas nye bar bcom pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de des gzir bar gyur pa'i phyir gal te na rku bar byed do/_/gal te na phan pa ma yin pa'i las gzhan cung zad tsam yang byed par 'gyur te/_lhan cig tu 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]gnas pa de gsod par byed pas 'chi ba'am 'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal 'di dag rnams thams cad kyi yang rtse mor phyin par sdug bsngal ni 'di lta ste/_bkres pa dang skom pas byas pa'i sdug bsngal lo/_/
[\[301a.2\]]de la dus de'i tshe na mu su lun d+ha des 'thab bral ba de dag rnams la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa/_ji ltar/_phal cher 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la/_/bkres pa'i sdug dang mtshungs med pa/_/gang gis sems can 'di dag gzir/_/mi dge'i bdag nyid byas pa 
[\[301a.3\]]las/_/rang gi lus las langs pa'i me/_/bkres pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/_/rnam rtog mes ni ljon shing bzhin/_/'jig rten gsum gyi lhag ma sreg_/'jig rten gzhan du me 'di ni/_/'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa brgya yi bar du 
[\[301a.4\]]yang /_/'chi bar gyur pa mthong ba med/_/gang yang byis rnams mi dge byed/_/gang yang 'gro ba ngan song du/_/de ni zas rnams dag gi ni/_/gzhi las yin par mkhas rnams brjod/_/ltogs pa'i 'bras bu ji bzhin du/_/mi ni rang don la brtson min/_/
[\[301a.5\]]khams gsum ma lus 'di dag rnams/_/zas kyi dbang gis 'jug pa yin/_/de dag gang phyir rnam sna tshogs/_/'jig rten 'di dag mi las byung /_/srid gsum chu bo de thams cad/_/zas don gnyer ba byed las yin/_/de ltar mu su lun d+ha des rang bzhin gyi lha de 
[\[301a.6\]]dag rnams la rjod par byed do/_/gzhan yang lha dag mi'i 'jig rten du mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal gang dag ce na/_'di lta ste mi sdug pa dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'o/_/de la drug po 'di dag rnams ni mi sdug pa dang kun du phrad pa yin no/_/de la de dag rnams kyang gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[301a.7\]]lta ste mig gis gzugs rnams gang dag mthong ba nas mdza' bo ma yin pa la sogs pa de dag rnams ni 'dod pa ma yin pa dang sdug pa ma yin pa rnams mthong ba yin no/_/gzugs 'di mthong bar gyur pa las kyang yid kyi rjes su mi 'thun zhing dang ba ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rnyog pa can du byas pa las kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal rnams sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la skyed par byed do/_/de la gzugs kyi tshogs de dag rnams kun la dang 
[\[301b.2\]]por 'di 'jug par 'gyur ba ni/_'di lta ste dgra bo dang phrad pa'am sdig pa'i grogs po'i skyes bu dang phrad pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna bas kyang sgra rnams thos pa na mi phan pa dang mi sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong zhing rjes su mi 'thun pa rnams 'di la skyed par byed pa dang /_yid kyi rgyun 
[\[301b.3\]]kyang rnyog pa can du byed pa 'di ni mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan yin no/_/de la mi 'thun pa'i sgra rnams kyi phul du phyin pa ni 'di yin te/_'di ltar dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sgrogs pa na yang de nyan par byed pa'o/_/'di thos nas lus zhig pa na yang ngan song log 
[\[301b.4\]]par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang gzhan cung zad sgra mi snyan pa dang mi sdug pa dang mi 'thun pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can rnams gang dag thos nas 'di dag rnams kyi yid mi bde ba skyed par byed pa dang /_sems kyi rgyud kyang rnyog pa can 
[\[301b.5\]]du byed par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'di ni mi'i 'jig rten pa'i mi rnams kyi mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes brjod do/_/lha dag gang mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten du mi 'thun pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gsum pa 
[\[301b.6\]]gzhan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste snas ji srid du dri rnams snom par byed pa na mi 'dod pa/_mi sdug pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_gang yang 'dis bsnams par gyur pas sems kyi rgyud rnyog pa can du skyed par byed pa dang /_yang yid kyi rjes su mi 'thun par gyur pa 
[\[301b.7\]]gang gis 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sdug bsngal rnams skyed par byed pa'o/_/kye ho lha dag de la 'di ni mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na mi sdug pa dang phrad pa rnams kyi phul du phyin pa yin te/_dge legs su gyur pa'i skyes bu gzhan dag gang yang rung ba rnams kyis chos 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]la mchod par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan du'am dge 'dun la yang rung ste/_bdug spos phul bar gyur pa las blo gros dman par gyur pa dang yid mong rtul bar gyur pa gang dag gis ji ltar 'gro bar gyur pa na'am 'dug par gyur pa na yang rung ste/_'dun pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[302a.2\]]sngon du 'gro bas dang /_mngon par gtse ba sngon du 'gro bas dang /_gus pa med pa sngon du btang bas dang /_thul 'og tu 'jug pa sngon du btang bas kyang rung ste/_kun nas chags pa sna phyogs su btang bas de yang snom par byed do/_/de'i rgyu las lus zhig par gyur nas 
[\[302a.3\]]ngan song log par ltung bar dmyal bar skye'o/_/skyes bu ngan pa rnams sna'i rgyu dang sna dang kun du 'brel pa las mi dge ba'i blo dang ldan pa rnams ni lus zhig par gyur pa dang ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/_/kye lha dag 'di ni mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na mi sdug 
[\[302a.4\]]pa rnams dang phrad pa las kun du skyes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes brjod do/_/gzhan yang mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams yod do/_/de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na blo gros ngan pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu 
[\[302a.5\]]ngan pa rnams ro'i don du nyes pa byed pa'i las rnams byed pa rnams yin la/_gang dag gi rgyus lus zhig pa na ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong gi cha byad 'dzin pa nang rul 
[\[302a.6\]]par gyur pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa dung gi sgra dang mtshungs par spyod pa rnams/_dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs par gyur pa'am sbyin bdag gi khyim du song bar gyur pa na yang rung ste/_lce dang rab tu 'brel ba dang de la song ba'i blos dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pas ro dag myong 
[\[302a.7\]]bar byed pa ni/_rgyu de dang rkyen de dag gis lus zhig pa nas ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/_/gang yang le lo can gyi dge slong gzhan rnams ni bsam gtan gyis bsam gtan du byed pa'i bya ba yongs su btang nas/_yid de la song ba dang rang gi 'dun 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa'i 'dod chags sngon du 'gro bas zas kyi don du gnas na gnas rnams su nye bar 'gro bar byed do/_/rgyu de las le lo can de lus zhig pa na ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kye ye'i lha dag de la 'di ni mi'i 'jig rten du mi rnams la lce ro dang kun 
[\[302b.2\]]du 'brel pa'i mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal yin no/_/gzhan yang kye lha dag mi rnams phan pa 'dod pas byas pa'i mi'i 'jig rten du mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gang zhe na/_de 'di lta ste lus kyis reg bya la reg par byed de/_de
